comments.creator: tnikkel@gmail.com
comments.text: data:text/html,<canvas moz-opaque="true"></canvas> shows a blank page. If you get the 2d context for the canvas it will turn black. Jeff says that it should always be black even without getting the context.
comments.author: tnikkel@gmail.com
comments.raw_text: data:text/html,<canvas moz-opaque="true"></canvas> shows a blank page. If you get the 2d context for the canvas it will turn black. Jeff says that it should always be black even without getting the context.
